name: Alan Blair
content: Alan Blair Alan Blair's Home Page Contact School of Computer Science & Engineering University of New South Wales, 2052, Australia blair "at" cse.unsw.edu.au Office K17-412C +61 2 9385 7131 (phone) +61 2 9385 5995 (fax) Research Research Interests Publications Links Computer-Generated Art (pickartso.com) Talk about DeepFake Technology for the Australian Skeptics Teaching Director of Studies for Bachelor of Advanced Computer Science(Honours). my COMP9444 Neural Networks and Deep Learning has been taken by more than 3000 students since I started teaching it in 2017. my COMP3411/9414 Artificial Intelligence course was taken by nearly 4000 students when I taught it from 2007 to 2019. Click here to view lecture slides and links to selected videos on my YouTube channel taught COMP1917 Computing 1 from 2006 to 2015. Current Students Xuefeng Li Jingying Gao (joint) Former Students Alex Long Cameron Stewart Rizka Purwanto (joint) Alexander Hadjiivanov Oliver Coleman Anthony Knittel David Fuchs (joint) Joel Veness Jamie Cullen Robin Harper Kai-Ming Kiang (joint) Steve Versteeg (joint) Stephan Chalup (joint) Interactive Games DuchessTM, a multi-player chess variant board game Conferences and Competitions I helped to establish Robocup Junior (Photos) Australasian Conference on Interactive Entertainment IEEE Conference on Computational Intelligence and Games
